meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Bow</kanji> as you <kanji>descend</kanji> into enemy territory. This is how you have to <vocabulary>surrender</vocabulary> if you want to live. Keep your head nice and low and descend into their ranks.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
